components.html:
Before filling in the rest of the application, contact the company to check:

- if they can do the transcript by the time you need it
- how much they charge

Company | Contact details
----|----
Auscript | Auscript website
Epiq | Epiq website
Marten Walsh Cherer | Marten Walsh Cherer  website
Opus 2 | Opus 2 website
The Transcription Agency | The Transcription Agency website
Ubiquis | Ubiquis website


You can pay more for them to do the work more quickly. The choices are:

- overnight (within 24 hours)
- within 48 hours
- within 7 working days
- within 3 working days
- within 12 working days
The time begins when the company starts the work - not when you submit your application.
